[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/key](./key.md) &gt; [Binding](./key.binding.md)

## Binding class

A set of keybindings with optional help text. Immutable—use with\* methods to derive modified copies.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class Binding 
```

</th><th>

</td></tr>

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[enabled()](./key.binding.enabled.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns true if this binding is enabled (not disabled and has keys). Disabled bindings won't be matched and won't show up in help.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[help()](./key.binding.help.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns the help text for this binding.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[keys()](./key.binding.keys.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns the keys for this binding.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unbound()](./key.binding.unbound.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns a new Binding with keys and help cleared. This is a step beyond disabling—it nullifies the binding entirely.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[withDisabled(disabled)](./key.binding.withdisabled.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns a new Binding with disabled set to the given value (default: true).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[withEnabled(enabled)](./key.binding.withenabled.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns a new Binding with enabled set (inverse of disabled).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[withHelp(key, desc)](./key.binding.withhelp.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns a new Binding with the given help text.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[withKeys(keys)](./key.binding.withkeys.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Returns a new Binding with the given keys.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
